AutocompletePlus_TagSource_PrimaryTagSou.name: Primary source for 'all' Source
AutocompletePlus_TagSource_PrimaryTagSou.tooltip: When 'Autocomplete Tag Source' is 'all', this determines which source's tags appear first in suggestions.

AutocompletePlus_TagSource.name: Autocomplete Tag Source
AutocompletePlus_TagSource.tooltip: Select the tag source for autocomplete suggestions. 'all' includes tags from all loaded sources.

AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_UseFastS.name: Use Fast Search
AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_UseFastS.tooltip: Tag search processing during text input operates faster, improving responsiveness.

AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_ReplaceU.name: Replace '_' with 'Space'
AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_ReplaceU.tooltip: This setting also affects related tags display.

AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_AutoInse.name: Auto-Insert Comma
AutocompletePlus_Autocompletion_AutoInse.tooltip: Automatically insert a comma after tags when inserting from autocomplete.

AutocompletePlus_RelatedTags_RelatedTags.name: Related Tags Trigger Mode
AutocompletePlus_RelatedTags_RelatedTags.tooltip: Which action will trigger displaying related tags for the entered tag (click only, Ctrl+click).

AutocompletePlus_Display_HideAlias.name: Hide Alias
AutocompletePlus_Display_HideAlias.tooltip: Hide alias column in the autocomplete and related tags display.
